sentences.sContent: In fact, his business career had distinctly unpromising beginnings.
sentences.sCn: 事实上，他的职业生涯开始时看起来非常没有前途。

remMethod.val: 不要和uncompromising(adj. 不妥协的)相混

trans.tranCn: 无前途的， 没有希望的
trans.tranOther: If you describe something as unpromising, you think that it is unlikely to be successful or produce anything good in the future
